alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Beaches; Malibu Coast; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 3:16PM PST until February 22 at 8:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. Isolated gusts between 55 to 60 mph possible across the Ventura Coast. * WHERE...Ventura County Beaches, Ventura County Inland Coast, Malibu Coast and Los Angeles County Beaches. * WHEN...Until 8 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Areas of blowing dust reducing visibility are expected in and near agricultural areas.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Beaches; Malibu Coast; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast
